title: three-raymarcher
info: Raymarching abstraction for creating simple SDF animations with threejs

title: SLIMERY.art
info: A SDF 3D editor with voxel and polygon exporters.

title: Dudes!
info: An opensource voxel engine with a backend implemented in C, 3D pathfinding and physics.

title: City of Mementos
info: A multiplayer voxel city where you can record and stumble upon ephemeral audio messages.

title: Realms
info: A voxel editor with a recursive twist. Create infinite worlds and light them with music in VR.

title: SpaceTrain
info: A combined set of example experiences for the blocks-editor connected by a train. You can enjoy some art, go to a show, play some sports, make some art with physics and more.

title: PointcloudPhysics
info: An example use case for the blocks-editor voxelizer and the "export physics" feature. Realtime physics simulation of a pointcloud mesh.

title: Beats
info: A live performance sandbox in VR. It features a multiplayer voice chat, 1 drum machine, 2 sequencers and a soloist instrument for each player.

title: Racer
info: A peer-to-peer racing web game. It features a procedurally generated track with particle effects and syncronizes it's clients through a WebRTC data channel.

title: Retrospective
info: A retro-style platformer for windows with a 3D perspective. Features procedural backgrounds, destructible environment, a level editor and gamepad support.

title: GLCannon
info: An opensorce C++ OpenGL ES 2.0 engine for Android. Built on top of SDL and the Bullet physics engine, it renders textured meshes with real-time lightning and rigid body simulations at 60FPS in a low-end phone.
